body.p: Power Request State Structure is used to maintain context information for outstanding power request. Memory for this structure is statically allocated as power_req_state_t.

fig.title: Power Request State Structure

plentry.pd: Specifies the index of one of the Power State Descriptors reported in the Identify Controller data structure. This field is only valid if opState is set to 06h.
This field contains the PCIe port on which the request was received. This field is only valid for shutdown requests, opState = 04h or opState = 05h.
Expected number of power completions from other managers.
Message queue number to send power cpl.
